section.p: Draw the graph of the function on the interval [0.1 , 1.0].
The best fit for this function on this interval is with a third order equation. Sucvh an equation looks like ax3 + bx2 +cx +d

Make an estimate of the accuracy of the function's approximation with the third order polynomial by calculating the sum of the quadratic deviations.

section.title: Answer
